name: UNITED STATES VIRGIN ISLANDS PUBLIC FINANCE AUTHORITY
sampleDescriptions: Assist USVI at DOI, DOE, and EPA to support the St. Croix Refinery. Advocate in Congress to support the extension of the rum cover over. Advocate to Treasury to help USVI get off EU list of non-cooper
